sentences.en: Coal mining enterprises and coal trading enterprises may not adulterate coal andcoalquality coal.
sentences.cn: 煤矿企业和煤炭经营企业不得在煤炭中掺杂、掺假,以次充好.

sentences.en: Consumers adulterate the milk, there will be abdominal pain, diarrhea and so on.
sentences.cn: 消费者在服用掺假牛奶之后, 会出现腹痛 、 腹泻等现象.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To report the breakage of protein and ammo acid in adulterate pangolin.

sentences.en: The food had been adulterated to increase its weight.
sentences.cn: 这种食物被掺了假以增加其重量。
